# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#F_Goods_Receipt_Notes = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Facts/F_Goods_Receipt_Notes.parquet', format='parquet')
#F_Goods_Receipt_Notes.createOrReplaceTempView("F_Goods_Receipt_Notes")

#ListDepots = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CCMasterData/ListDepots.parquet', format='parquet')
#ListDepots.createOrReplaceTempView("ListDepots")

#F_TRANSACTIONS_FINAL = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Facts/F_TRANSACTIONS_CONTINUED.parquet', format='parquet')
#F_TRANSACTIONS_FINAL.createOrReplaceTempView("F_TRANSACTIONS_FINAL")
## Start of Dimension table creation Dim_PO_LOOKUP & Dim_Group

DIM_PO_LOOKUP = spark.sql("""
SELECT distinct DocNum||Company as `Goods_Receipt_Number_KEY`,
     BaseRef as `Purchase_Order_Number`,
	 DocNum as `Goods_Receipt_Number`,
	 CAST(DocDate AS DATE) as `Goods_Receipt_Posting_Date`
FROM F_Goods_Receipt_Notes

UNION ALL 

SELECT distinct CONCAT(DocNum,Company) as `Goods_Receipt_Number_KEY`,
     BaseRef as `Purchase_Order_Number`,
	 DocNum as `Goods_Receipt_Number`,
	 CAST(DocDate AS DATE) as `Goods_Receipt_Posting_Date`
FROM F_Goods_Receipt_Notes
""")
#DIM_PO_LOOKUP.show()
DIM_PO_LOOKUP.createOrReplaceTempView("DIM_PO_LOOKUP")

DIM_GROUP = spark.sql("""
SELECT --DepotID,
    DepotName AS DEPOTNAME,
    DepotCode AS DEPOTCODE,
    ParentDepotCode AS PARENTDEPOTCODE,
    Division AS DIVISION,
    Address,
    Latitude,
    Longitude,
    SAPDepreciationAccountCode,
    MFRAuthoriser,
    MFRApplicationFlag,
    ActiveFlag,
    OperationsManager,
    BranchManager,
    FleetManager
FROM ListDepots
""")
#DIM_GROUP.show()
DIM_GROUP.createOrReplaceTempView("DIM_GROUP")

GROUP = spark.sql("""
SELECT `DEPOTCODE` as `Depot_Code`,
	   `DEPOTCODE` as `MFRDepotCode`,
 	   `DEPOTCODE`,	
  	   `DIVISION`
FROM DIM_GROUP
""")
#GROUP.show()
GROUP.createOrReplaceTempView("GROUP")
## Write success message for production script
